DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study analyze income variable Chronic Fatigue Syndrome/Myalgic Encephalomyelitis , analyze effect short vs. long Cognitive Behaviour Therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Survey Cognitive Behavior Therapy Chronic Fatigue Syndrome/Myalgic Encephalomyelitis
DOC.criteria: Patients refer St.Olav Hospital , Trondheim fulfil FUKUDA criterion CFS/ME . Pregnant patient
